Have you been diagnosed with a mood disorder by a mental health professional? This includes Depression, Major Depressive Disorder, Bipolar Disorder type I or II, Cyclothymic Disorder, Persistent Depressive Disorder (Dysthymia), and Premenstrual Dysphoric Disorder.
Which mood disorders have you been diagnosed with? Please select all that apply.
How many years ago were you first diagnosed with a mood disorder (to the best of your ability to recall)?
Are you currently receiving treatment for this disorder, if so, which types? Please select all treatments that you have received in the last month that are intended to treat your mood disorder(s).
column8: I am not receiving treatment for a mood disorder
column9: One-on-one talk therapy with a professional
column11: Selective Serotonin Reuptake Inhibitor (SSRI), such as: Prozac (fluoxotine), Celexa (citalopram), Lexapro (escitalopram), Paroxetine (Paxil), Sertraline (Zoloft)
column12: Serotonin and Norepinephrine Reuptake Inhibitor (SNRI), such as: Cymbalta (duloxetine), Effexor (venalfaxine)
column13: Tricyclic Antidepressant (TCA), such as: Anafranil (clomipramine), Sinequan (doxepin)
column14: Monoamine Oxidase Inhibitor (MAOI), such as: Emsam (selegiline), Marplan (isocarboxaxid)
column15: Serotonin Antagonist and Reuptake Inhibitors, such as: Oleptro (trazodone), Brintellix (vortioxetine)

column7: In the past two weeks have you been bothered by symptoms of your mood disorder(s)?

Have you been diagnosed with an anxiety disorder by a mental health professional? This includes: Generalized Anxiety Disorder Separation Anxiety Disorder Agoraphobia Specific Phobia Social Anxiety Disorder (Social Phobia) Panic Disorder Panic Attack Selective Mutism

How many years ago were you first diagnosed with an anxiety disorder (to the best of your ability to recall)?

column8: I am not receiving treatment for an anxiety disorder
column9: One-on-one talk therapy with a professional
column11: Selective Serotonin Reuptake Inhibitor (SSRI), such as: Prozac (fluozotine), Celexa (citalopram), Lexapro (escitalopram), Paroxetine (Paxil), Sertraline (Zoloft
column12: Serotonin and Norepinephrine Reuptake Inhibitor (SNRI), such as: Cymbalta (duloxetine), Effexor (venalfaxine)
column13: Tricyclic Antidepressant (TCA), such as: Anafranil (clomipramine), Sinequan (doxepin)
column14: Benzodiazepine, such as: Xanax (alprazolam), Valium (diazepam), Ativan (lorazepam), Librium (chlordiazepoxide)
column15: Monoamine Oxidase Inhibitor (MAOI), such as: Emsam (selegiline), Marplan (isocarboxaxid)
